segments.text: Hi , Steven , take a seat ! How are things at work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's coming along well , but it is a little delayed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you finish it on time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm pressed for time and I am afraid I need someone to help me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will send Beker to help you . We need to get the brochures done and sent them to our clients on Friday without delay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , we promise to do it well .
segments.speaker: S2
